attributes.action: Scotland want #BigEcksit now! Plus  the removal of the current board of the SFA!
attributes.additional_details: We have been beaten by Kazakhstan & Israel in the past year! Evidence enough that we are going backwards!
attributes.background: The people of Scotland are fed up with the state of the national game. We would like to enjoy every second summer utilizing our passports to go watch Scotland compete at a major tournament! The current crop of players should be good enough to do this!  We just need good leadership to steer us there!
